Html:
There is a java emulator of these texas calculators here
http://xandrean.free.fr/T4X/

The roms can be dumped from ti-smartview official emulator.

It would be great if we could use these calculators in wabbitemu for android!

An unrelated question: I have ti-81 v2.0v rom and it doesn't seem to work in wabbitemu for android. Which version of ti-81 is supported? (when I choose this rom the emulator restarts and ask again for a rom)

Thanks!

Unfortunately, TI-30XS, 34 and College-Plus use a different CPU than the 83 series of calculators. Wabbit currently is only a Z80 emulator, so to support the calculators requires a lot of reverse engineering.

As for your issue with the TI-81v2 rom, all known versions of the TI-81 should work. I've tested with a 1.1, 1.5, 1.6, 1.8, and 2.0. Give the 1.04 update a shot and see if it fixes the issue.

BuckeyeDude
